name: Your Royal Gayness
description: The library is on fire, cats have overrun the city and a wolf is munching on grandmothers in the forest. On top of that, princesses are knocking on your door, hungry for marriage! Survive royal life as a gay prince in this ultimate fairytale parody game!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Microsoft Windows XP Professional 5.1.2600 Service Pack 3 处理器: x86 Family 6 Model 42 Stepping 7 GenuineIntel ~2893 MHz 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: Intel(R) HD Graphics 存储空间: 需要 700 MB 可用空间 声卡: Any 附注事项: Will run on most modern computers, including laptops.
